      • sendOnRoute

        public void sendOnRoute​(Route r,
                        AllEmployees ae,
                        int[][] distances)
        Function to send this Vehicle on Route. It assigns a random Employee as driver and sets the destination as the first Stop on the Route.
        Parameters:
        r - Route to be sent to.
        ae - List of all Employees.
        distances - The matrix of distances between all the Places.

      • setDriver

        public Employee setDriver​(AllEmployees ae)
        Function to set a random Employee as driver for this Vehicle.
        Parameters:
        ae - The list of all the Employees.
        Returns:
        Employee The random Employee obtained.

      • removeDriver

        public void removeDriver()
        Function to remove active driver.

      • passTime

        public void passTime​(int time,
                     int[][] distances)
        Function that enables the passage of time (thus the movement of the vehicle from current location towards the destination.
        Parameters:
        time - The amount of time that passes.
        distances - The matrix of distances between all the Places.
